aboutusintro.title: About 123 Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Unmatched Quality
aboutusintro.description: Founded in Jamnagar, 123 Brass has been a leading manufacturer of high-quality brass and steel forged components. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern manufacturing technologies to deliver exceptional precision and reliability for our industrial clients.

items.name: Rajesh Patel
items.content: 123 Brass consistently delivers exceptional quality and precision. Their custom forging solutions have been crucial to our manufacturing process.

items.name: Sameer Khan
items.content: Reliable, innovative, and technically superior - 123 Brass has been our go-to partner for complex brass forging requirements.
